item.title: RBAC x ReBAC, a hybrid authorization model for big technology companies
item.description: Note: This article is an abandoned draft. I still feel some of the ideas and concepts are helpful, so I’ve left it here in case the thought experiment benefits anyone. When one access-control model isn’t enough An application’s access-control scheme is an important part of ensuring safety within your business. Most companies I’ve worked with have employed an RBAC model to secure their internal applications, which has provides a good-enough set of restrictions and controls for employees.
